module.name: GraphType
module.short: Definitions of several special types (including Raw Image) to be used for graphics

element.name: TRawImageDescription
element.short: TRawImageDescription - a descriptor record for Raw Images
element.descr: Note: not all devices/images have all parts at any time. But if a part can be applied to the device/image, the 'Description' describes its structure.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Format
element.short: Format - whether RGB+/- Alpha or greyscale, or uninitialised

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Depth
element.short: Depth - used bits per pixel

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Width
element.short: Width of the image

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Height
element.short: Height of the image

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteColorCount
element.short: PaletteColorCount - entries in color palette. 0 when no palette.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BitOrder
element.short: BitOrder - whether bit 0 or bit 7 is stored first

element.name: TRawImageDescription.ByteOrder
element.short: ByteOrder - whether Most Significant Byte (MSB) or Least SB is stored first

element.name: TRawImageDescription.LineOrder
element.short: LineOrder - whether line 0 represents the top or the bottom line

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BitsPerPixel
element.short: BitsPerPixel - can be greater than Depth

element.name: TRawImageDescription.LineEnd
element.short: LineEnd - whether lines end at Byte, Word, Double or Quad Word (etc) boundary, or there is no gap at the end of a line

element.name: TRawImageDescription.RedPrec
element.short: RedPrec - number of bits of precision for red

element.name: TRawImageDescription.RedShift
element.short: RedShift number of bits to shift red (least to most significant)

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GreenPrec
element.short: GreenPrec - number of bits of precision for green

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GreenShift
element.short: GreenShift number of bits to shift green (least to most significant)

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BluePrec
element.short: BluePrec - number of bits of precision for blue

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BlueShift
element.short: BlueShift number of bits to shift blue (least to most significant)

element.name: TRawImageDescription.AlphaPrec
element.short: AlphaPrec - number of bits of precision for alpha

element.name: TRawImageDescription.AlphaShift
element.short: AlphaShift number of bits to shift alpha (least to most significant)

element.name: PRawImageDescription
element.short: PRawImageDescription - pointer to TRawImageDescription

element.name: TRawImage
element.short: TRawImage a Raw Image (such as a digital photograph before compression)

element.name: TRawImage.Description
element.short: Description record for the Raw Image

element.name: TRawImage.Data
element.short: Data - a pointer to the actual data of the image

element.name: TRawImage.DataSize
element.short: DataSize - pointer to the size of the image

element.name: TRawImage.Mask
element.short: Mask - pointer to the Mask for use with the image

element.name: TRawImage.MaskSize
element.short: MaskSize - pointer to the size of the mask

element.name: TRawImage.Palette
element.short: Palette - pointer to the palette of colours for this image

element.name: TRawImage.PaletteSize
element.short: PaletteSize - pointer to the size of the palette

element.name: PRawImage
element.short: PRawImage - pointer to a TRawImage

element.name: TRawImagePosition
element.short: TRawImagePosition - record describing the position of a Raw Image

element.name: PRawImagePosition
element.short: PRawImagePosition - pointer to a TRawImagePosition

element.name: GetBitsPerLine
element.short: GetBitsPerLine - returns the number of bits per line (as a pointer)

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBitsPerPixel
element.short: MaskBitsPerPixel - bits per mask pixel, usually 1, 0 when no mask

descr.p: Values are only valid, if there is a mask (MaskBitsPerPixel > 0)
Masks are always separate with a depth of 1 bpp. One pixel can occupy one byte at most
A value of 1 means that pixel is masked; a value of 0 means the pixel value is shown

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskShift
element.short: MaskShift - the shift (=position) of the mask bit

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskLineEnd
element.short: MaskLineEnd - how the line is to be ended

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBitOrder
element.short: MaskBitOrder - bit order to use for the mask

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteBitsPerIndex
element.short: PaletteBitsPerIndex - bits per palette index, this can be larger than the colors used

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteShift
element.short: PaletteShift - bitshift. Direction: from least to most significant

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteLineEnd
element.short: PaletteLineEnd - how lines are ended in the palette

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteBitOrder
element.short: PaletteBitOrder - bit order for the palette

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteByteOrder
element.short: PaletteByteOrder - byte order for the palette

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init
element.short: Init - initialise the image descriptor. Don't use a contructor here, it will break compatibility with a record

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format

descr.pre:
{ pf24bit:
Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=24 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB - initiator for specfied format

descr.pre:
{ pf24bit:
Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=24 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 Masked }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format

descr.pre:
{ pf32bit:
Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 No alpha No mask }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format

descr.pre:
{ pf32bit:
Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 no alpha with mask }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format

descr.pre:
{ pf32bit:
Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=32 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 alpha no mask }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_M1_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_M1_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format

descr.pre:
{ pf32bit:
Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=32 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 alpha masked }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GetDescriptionFromMask
element.short: GetDescriptionFromMask - returns an image descriptor obtained from the mask

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GetDescriptionFromAlpha
element.short: GetDescriptionFromAlpha - returns an image descriptor obtained from the Alpha

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BytesPerLine
element.short: The number of BytesPerLine. Returns a pointer

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BitsPerLine
element.short: The number of BitsPerLine. Returns a pointer

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBytesPerLine
element.short: The number of MaskBytesPerLine. Returns a pointer

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBitsPerLine
element.short: The number of MaskBitsPerLine. Returns a pointer

element.name: TRawImageDescription.AsString
element.short: AsString - returns the image as a string

element.name: TRawImageDescription.IsEqual
element.short: IsEqual - compares th ecurrent descriptor with another, and returns True if they are equal

element.name: TRawImage.Init
element.short: Init - initiator for the object. Don't use a contructor here, it will break compatibility with a record

element.name: TRawImage.CreateData
element.short: CreateData - method to create the data for the record

element.name: TRawImage.FreeData
element.short: FreeData - releases data that had previously been locked or made unavailable

element.name: TRawImage.ReleaseData
element.short: ReleaseData - frees the resources when finished with th edata

element.name: TRawImage.ExtractRect
element.short: ExtractRect - find the position of the bounding rectangle from the raw data

element.name: TRawImage.PerformEffect
element.short: PerformEffect - applies a specified special effect to the data of the Raw Image

element.name: TRawImage.ReadBits
element.short: ReadBits - reads the bit values for the raw image data at a given position

element.name: TRawImage.ReadChannels
element.short: ReadChannels - reads the (R, G, B, Alpha) channel values at a given position in the raw data

element.name: TRawImage.ReadMask
element.short: ReadMask - reads the Mask data at the given position in the raw image

element.name: TRawImage.WriteBits
element.short: WriteBits - writes the specified bit values at the nominated position in the data

element.name: TRawImage.WriteChannels
element.short: WriteChannels - writes the specified channel values at the nominated position

element.name: TRawImage.IsMasked
element.short: IsMasked - returns True if the specified pixels are masked

element.name: TRawImage.IsTransparent
element.short: IsTransparent - returns True if the specified pixels are transparent

element.name: TRawImage.IsEqual
element.short: IsEqual - returns True if the current and specified images are equal

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts
element.short: TRawImageLineStarts - contains a list of the start positions of the lines in the Raw Image

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts.Positions
element.short: Positions - the array of start positions

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts.Init
element.short: Init - initiator for the object. Don't use a constructor here, it will break compatibility with a record

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts.GetPosition
element.short: GetPosition - returns the position specified by x, y coordinates as a TRawImagePosition

element.name: PRawImageLineStarts
element.short: PRawImageLineStarts - pointer to TRawImageLineStarts

element.name: GetBytesPerLine
element.short: GetBytesPerLine - returns the number of bytes per line (as a pointer)

element.name: CopyImageData
element.short: CopyImageData - copies data from ASource to ADestination, returning True if successful
